short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool will show you the position in the queue, provide direct links to events, and will soon get you discounts on tickets!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GET THE TICKETS YOU WANT!

You'll be able to see how close to the front of the queue you are, plus, direct links to the Eras dates.

Split Payments into 4, interest free - Taylor's Expensive!

5% DISCOUNT ON TICKETS VIA TICKETMASTER!!!!

PLUS - EARLY PRESALE ACCESS!!!!!!

Every New tab will take you directly to the listing page for Taylor's tour, saving you time navigating, and meaning you dont waste precious time copy & pasting!!
